messages.text: Hi, I need to file a claim for water damage in my basement that happened yesterday from the heavy rain.
I'm sorry to hear about the water damage. I'm here to help. Can you please provide me with your policy number?
Yes, it's HOM-2024-7890. The damage happened yesterday evening when it rained heavily.
I'm sorry to hear that. Let me pull up your policy information. I can see your dwelling coverage. For water damage claims, you have a $1000 deductible.
Okay, that's good to know. So what's the next step? What do I need to do?
Yes, you'll need to document all the damage with photos and get a professional assessment. Our claims process requires detailed documentation of all affected areas.
That makes sense. How long does the claims process usually take?

Once we receive all documentation, claims typically take 10-15 business days to process. However, since water damage can be complex and require professional restoration, I think it would be better to connect you with one of our claims specialists.
That sounds good. Will they be able to help me with everything?
Yes, absolutely. They handle water damage claims regularly and can guide you through the entire process, including arranging for a professional damage assessment.
Perfect. Let me connect you with Tom Williams, one of our senior claims specialists. He'll take excellent care of you.
You're being connected now. Please hold for just one moment.
You're welcome! Tom will be with you in just a moment.
